name: Bomb Rush (Lenan)
description:
Download and extract the bomb rush.rar
Run the Bomb Rush.exe

Controls:

Player 1:
W A S D - Move
Space - Bomb

Player 2:
Keyboard Arrows - Move
Numeric Keyboard Enter - Bomb

Can be controlled using a controller

Players 3 and 4 can only be controlled using controllers.

To restart the game after a round press ENTER.
